```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(here)
```

# Load data

```{r}
un_geopolitical <- read_csv("/home/shares/food-systems/Food_footprint/chicken_salmon/_spatial/UNSD_Methodology.csv") %>%
  rename(georegion=Region_Name) %>% 
  dplyr::select(iso3c, georegion) %>% 
  filter(!iso3c == "ATA")
```


```{r}
cells<-read.csv(here("_analysis/output_data/CPI_cells_by_country.csv"))
```

```{r}
cells2<-full_join(un_geopolitical, cells)
```


```{r}
ggplot(cells2, aes(x = prop_broiler, y = prop_high_broiler)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
ggplot(cells2, aes(x = prop_broiler, y = prop_high_broiler)) +
  facet_wrap(~georegion) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
ggplot(cells2, aes(x = prop_salmon, y = prop_high_salmon)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
ggplot(cells2, aes(x = prop_salmon, y = prop_high_salmon)) +
  facet_wrap(~georegion) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```
```{r}
ggplot(cells2, aes(x = prop_broiler, y = prop_salmon)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```
```{r}
ggplot(cells2, aes(x = prop_broiler, y = prop_salmon)) +
  facet_wrap(~georegion) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
ggplot(cells2, aes(x = prop_high_salmon, y = prop_high_broiler)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```
